summary: Birmingham is a city in Alabama, named after a city in England. It was founded in 1871 and became a big industrial center, especially for iron, steel, and railroads. People often called it "The Magic City" because it grew so fast. Today, Birmingham is still an important business and banking center. It's home to several big companies and universities, like the University of Alabama at Birmingham. The city has a rich history and is known for its role in the Civil Rights Movement.
title: Birmingham, Alabama
